tool_description: Analyzes documents to identify existing signature fields, validate their properties, and suggest optimal locations for new signature fields.

document_path.description: Path to document to analyze for signature fields

field_types.description: Types of signature fields to identify

suggest_new_fields.description: Whether to suggest locations for new signature fields

error_messages: Document parsing failed: Cannot analyze signature fields due to document format or corruption issues.

usage: Provide document_path to analyze signature field locations and properties. Specify field_types array to focus on specific signature field types. Enable suggest_new_fields for field placement recommendations.

existing_fields.description: Properties of existing signature fields found

field_count.description: Total number of signature fields identified

suggested_locations.description: Recommended locations for new signature fields

analysis_summary.description: Summary of signature field analysis results
